EmailTemplate.description: Send to new leads that have a bad or no phone number
EmailTemplate.name: Direct : No Phone Number
EmailTemplate.subject: Call me, maybe?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I’d love to have a quick call to talk about your business and where you want to take it, but it turns out I don’t have a good phone number for you.
When you have a second, can you call me at +1 {!Lead.OwnerPhone} so we can talk? You can also just email your number and a good time to call and I’ll put it on my calendar.
I promise I won’t ring you up for any late-night chats about politics or philosophy (unless you request it).
Hope to hear from you soon!
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} eCommerce Business Consultant
O +1 {!Lead.OwnerPhone} | 1-888-699-8911 (Toll Free) E {!Lead.OwnerEmail} A 11305 Four Points Drive | Bldg II Suite 300 | Austin, TX 78726
Visit us at bigcommerce.com Follow us News | Facebook | Twitter
